title: Cartoon Snowflakes
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 16 Snowflakes sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/hdxS80uR2ik


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS
